original_text:
Have they no knowledge, all the evildoers
    who eat up my people as they eat bread
    and do not call upon the Lord?
korean_text: 죄악을 행하는 자는 다 무지하냐 그들이 떡 먹듯이 내 백성을 먹으면서 여호와를 부르지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: who eat up my people as they eat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 빵 먹듯이 내 백성을 삼키는 자들이냐

sentences.original_text: and do not call upon the Lord?
